The Coinbase Dapps Extension is your secure gateway to explore and engage with the crypto world right from your browser. Whether you're tracking live prices, exploring transactions, or diving into market insights, our extension provides all the essential tools in one place.

üåê Blockchain Explorer: Easily search and explore blockchain transactions to keep track of addresses and activity.

üîç Wallet Address Explorer: Effortlessly view transactions associated with wallet addresses for a clear snapshot of activity.

üíπ Market Cap Explorer: Access detailed insights into market capitalization and cryptocurrency rankings to better understand market dynamics.

The Coinbase Dapps Extension is built with a focus on security, convenience, and reliable information, making it the perfect tool for both crypto enthusiasts and newcomers alike.
